name: United We Go
description:
Speed focused puzzle game where you have to drop more than one copy of your player to collect letters to complete a specific WORD.
[CONTROLS] : 
1. [Left Mouse Click] to spawn the player.
2. [SPACE BAR] to interact and to drop the player.
3. [ESC] to go to main menu.
4. [F] to toggle Fullscreen (ON / OFF)
[NOTE]: This game was created for the ( Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 ).
(Have Fun).
